description:
Discover ancient Altars and perform dangerous Rituals to earn valuable rewards.

This is the default Path of Exile league.

Discover ancient Altars and perform dangerous Rituals to earn valuable rewards.

A character killed in Hardcore Ritual becomes a Standard character.
